data.title:
50% extra trade credit towards New Releases & Preorders
					New Release titles are eligible up to two weeks after launch
data.fineprint: In store only. Eligible titles are for Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Xbox Series X & PS5. Offer valid only towards games normally accepted in trade. Games must include original cases and artwork. Extra trade should cover up to the cost of the game purchased. Extra trade is to be put towards new release games or game pre-orders. Cannot be combined with any other trade offer including EDGE. No duplicate titles accepted. Trades must be in full working condition to receive full value. Subject to Manager approval. Offer subject to change at any time.

data.title: Save $10 select USED Controllers (save $5 on each USED Nintendo Switch Joycon)
data.fineprint: Applicable when customer purchases select USED controllers. Cannot be combined with any other offer or EDGE. Quantity & Selection may vary by store. Offer subject to change at any time. No substitutions will be made. No rainchecks.

data.title: USED Bundle Promo: Buy 1 USED Console and 1 USED game or 1 USED controller and save 10%, Buy all 3 and save 15%
data.fineprint: Get a USED console and 1 used game or used controller of the same platform and save 10% off each item. Buy 1 used console plus 1 used game plus 1 used controller all of the same platform and save 15%. Excludes USED PS5 Pro consoles. Cannot be combined with any other USED offer. Cannot be combined with EDGE discount. Offer subject to change at any time.
